name: Jumpstart
description: JumpStart in Music is a low-cost, high-impact version of our Summer Music Camp. JumpStart brings together Bay Area public school students and their music instructors—along with high school mentors and parent chaperones—for an action-packed three day music immersion program at our camp during the school year. JumpStart In Music Retreats Include - Four to five hours of practice and rehearsals on both Friday and Saturday. - Extra help and coaching from high school music mentors. - Time for rest, re

howToGetIt: For More Information About JumpStart in Music Contact Emily Wainacht, Executive Director at JumpStart@Cazadero.org or call 510-527-7500 Ext. 13.
